H3.text: who did kurt warner play 4. St. Louis Rams

A4.text: He was signed by the Green Bay Packers in 1994, but released before the regular season.

A5.text: He played in the National Football League (NFL) for 12 seasons, primarily with the St. Louis Rams and Arizona Cardinals.

A6.text: In the 2008 postseason, the Cardinals, led by quarterback Kurt Warner, won the Wild Card Round over the Atlanta Falcons.
